name: Dark Canyon
description:
This is a first person shooting game.

Players play the role of soldiers.

Exploring the canyon, but

Being attacked by zombies

Surrounded by zombies

Pick up the weapons around you

Killing zombies with weapons

Protect yourself

Players can explore nearby.

Players can avoid the enemy's attack or kill the enemy to survive.

Control key:

Right click the target

WASD movement

Move left operation

Left mouse button attack

Space jump

Left squat

Mouse control direction

Loading weapons

F take up arms
